resources.string: Read External Storage permission denied, this share link\'s image is local(%s), can not load file, Pls grant permission(Just read)
Please select regular QQ this time
A module to retrieve URL when opening the QQ applet. Developed by @Decontamination(Coolapk)

This is a small tool for convert your QQ Applet share link to normal link actively and export the existed applet info\nDeveloped by: Alcatraz(Coolapk)\nIdea by: Neuron(Coolapk),as always, this program is free and no ads

1.Active sharing
You can find 'NoApplet' in the choose list, select it, check the share content and click the green button, This time PLS SELECT NORMAL QQ, then you are done
 2.Export Existed
Start the target applet, and you will see the AlertDialog

For latest bilibili, it will create image locally under /sdcard/tmp, if you have activated Storage Redirect, this will cause share failure no matter if you use this app, there may be other app with the same issue
